item.title: By: Spanning The Gap at MMOG Nation
item.dc:creator: Spanning The Gap at MMOG Nation
item.description: [...] Foton truthsays again, talking about the ever-increasing gap between the high-end raiders and the rest of us schlubs. That creaking sound you hear? That's the ever widening gap between those who have been raiding for-fucking-ever and those that haven't. We still have the wherewithall to suit up a green raider and have him join us the next night, but guilds a few steps down the food chain do not. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Foton truthsays again, talking about the ever-increasing gap between the high-end raiders and the rest of us schlubs. That creaking sound you hear? That’s the ever widening gap between those who have been raiding for-fucking-ever and those that haven’t. We still have the wherewithall to suit up a green raider and have him join us the next night, but guilds a few steps down the food chain do not. […]
